statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email, segment FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, income FROM customers WHERE income >= 50000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' AND growth_potential = true;
SELECT customer_id, age, segment FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY income DESC, name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, name, gender FROM customers WHERE segment='VIP' AND income > 100000 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE gender='Female' AND growth_potential = true LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE income BETWEEN 50000 AND 80000 AND growth_potential = true ORDER BY age DESC, income ASC;
SELECT customer_id, segment FROM customers WHERE age >= 25 AND gender='Male' ORDER BY segment, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_age FROM Customers WHERE customer_segment = 'Premium';
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_age FROM Customers WHERE customer_segment = 'VIP' ORDER BY customer_age DESC, customer_name ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM Customers JOIN Transactions ON Customers.customer_id = Transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_segment, COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM Customers GROUP BY customer_segment HAVING total_customers > 2 ORDER BY total_customers DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM Transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_transactions > 5 ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_segment FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_segment FROM customers WHERE customer_segment = 'High';
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, sale_amount FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT segment_name, growth_potential FROM segments WHERE growth_potential = 'medium';
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id JOIN segments ON customers.customer_segment = segments.segment_name;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, city FROM customers ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, city, segment_name FROM customers INNER JOIN customer_segments ON customers.customer_id = customer_segments.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, city FROM customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 500.00
SELECT segment_name FROM customer_segments WHERE high_growth_potential = TRUE
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_name, unit_price, category FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50.00;
SELECT transaction_id, quantity, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price < 50.00 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
